survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and experiences with VR fitness applications, focusing on usability, engagement, and effectiveness for home workouts.

questions.question_text: How often do you use VR fitness applications?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: How often do you use VR fitness applications?

questions.question_text: Which VR fitness applications have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which VR fitness applications have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using VR fitness applications?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' text option. Ensure the question is clear and concise.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using VR fitness applications?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of workouts available in your VR fitness app?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q1 with 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure consistent scale labels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of workouts available in your VR fitness app?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q1 with 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week'

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a VR fitness application? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select with a limit of 3 choices. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selections = 3 and optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a VR fitness application? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current VR fitness app to others?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q1 with 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week'
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current VR fitness app to others?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q1 with 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your VR fitness app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Allow for long-form responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your VR fitness app?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using VR fitness apps?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q1 with 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month'
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge technical reliability.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using VR fitness apps?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q1 with 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month'

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to experiencing technical issues, please describe the most common issue:
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q8 with 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up to Q8. Optional for respondents.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to experiencing technical issues, please describe the most common issue:
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered Q8 with 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'

questions.question_text: How much do you typically spend monthly on VR fitness applications or related subscriptions?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with clear price ranges. Avoid overlapping ranges.

script.question_text: How much do you typically spend monthly on VR fitness applications or related subscriptions?
